PhyMediumComments: black-and-white: Agfa Superpan Press safety film
CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 8, 1941, pg. 10 reads: "Leading Figures in Repeat Performance of "Aida" - Leading figures in repeat performance of "Aida," in Syria Mosque last Thursday evening. It was another artistic success...the junior group of dancers..."
TitMainTitle: Child dancers wearing Egyptian costumes, including Mamie Hamilton wearing light colored costume and headband, posed with hands raised on staircase in Syria Mosque for National Negro Opera Company performance of "Aida"
